$certification.getCertificationName()

EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying work item owners of new certifications. Arguments --------- workItemName (String): The name of the Workitem workItem (Workitem): The Workitem object certification (Certification): The Certification Object requesterName (String): The display name of the Identity that requested the certification

Argument.name: workItemName
Argument.Description: The description property (also the name property) of the certification WorkItem.

Argument.name: workItem
Argument.Description: The WorkItem object for the certification.

Argument.name: requesterName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that requested the certification.

Argument.name: ownerName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that owns the certification.

EmailTemplate.Subject: ACTION REQUIRED NATIVE CHANGE ACCESS CERTIFICATION
